chapter.title: Inserting TeX Code into LyX Documents
chapter.para: Anything you can do in LaTeX you can do in LyX, for a very simple reason: You can always insert TeX code into any LyX document. LyX cannot, and will never be able to, display every possible LaTeX construct. If ever you need to insert LaTeX commands into your LyX document, you can use the TeX Code box, which you can insert into your document with Insert⇒TeX Code or the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+L.
